meaningMnemonic:
踏む is "to step on" and the kanji 込 means <kanji>into</kanji>, so this means <vocabulary>to step into</vocabulary>.

踏み込む means to step further and harder than usual, like stepping forward to lunge for a ball or stepping hard on the accelerator. Figuratively, it can also mean <vocabulary>to intrude</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to delve into</vocabulary>, like stepping into someone's house without permission or exploring complex topics one step further.
readingMnemonic: The readings come from the word 踏む and the kanji 込, put together.
